text: Those who are under the yoke as slaves must regard their own masters as deserving of full respect. This will prevent the name of God and Christian teaching from being discredited.

But those who have believing masters must not show them less respect because they are brothers. Instead they are to serve all the more, because those who benefit from their service are believers and dearly loved.

Teach them and exhort them about these things.

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="2085">spreads false teachings</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4334">agree with</st> <st data-num="5198" class="">sound</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">words</st> (that is, those of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ)</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> with the <st data-num="1319" class="">teaching</st> that <st data-num="2596">accords with</st> <st data-num="2150" class="">godliness</st>,

he is <st data-num="5187" class="">conceited</st> and <st data-num="1987" class="">understands</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">nothing</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> has an <st data-num="3552">unhealthy interest</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2214" class="">controversies</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3055">verbal disputes</st>. <st data-num="1537 3739">This</st> <st data-num="1096">gives rise</st> to <st data-num="5355" class="">envy</st>, <st data-num="2054" class="">dissension</st>, <st data-num="988" class="">slanders</st>, <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="5283" class="">suspicions</st>,

and <st data-num="3859">constant bickering</st> by <st data-num="444" class="">people</st> <st data-num="1311" class="">corrupted</st> in their <st data-num="3563" class="">minds</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="650" class="">deprived</st> of the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>, who <st data-num="3543" class="">suppose</st> that <st data-num="2150" class="">godliness</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a way of <st data-num="4200">making a profit</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="2150" class="">godliness</st> <st data-num="3326">combined with</st> <st data-num="841" class="">contentment</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">brings</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="4200" class="">profit</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> we have <st data-num="1533" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> this <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="3761">and</st> <st data-num="3754">so</st><n id="1" /> we <st data-num="3761 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="1627" class="">take</st> a <st data-num="5100">single thing</st> <st data-num="1627" class="">out</st> either.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> if we <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="1305" class="">food</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4629" class="">shelter</st>, we will be <st data-num="714" class="">satisfied</st> with <st data-num="3778" class="">that</st>.<n id="1" />

Those who <st data-num="1014" class="">long</st> to be <st data-num="4147" class="">rich</st>, <st data-num="1161">however</st>, <st data-num="1706" class="">stumble</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3986" class="">temptation</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="3803" class="">trap</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="453" class="">senseless</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="983" class="">harmful</st> <st data-num="1939" class="">desires</st> <st data-num="3748" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1036" class="">plunge</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3639" class="">ruin</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="684" class="">destruction</st>.
For the love of money is the root of all evils. Some people in reaching for it have strayed from the faith and stabbed themselves with many pains.
But you, as a person dedicated to God, keep away from all that. Instead pursue righteousness, godliness, faithfulness, love, endurance, and gentleness.

<st data-num="75" class="">Compete</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">well</st><n id="1" /> for the <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> and <st data-num="1949">lay hold</st> of that <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> you were <st data-num="2564">called</st> <st data-num="1519">for</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3670" class="">made</st> your <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="3671" class="">confession</st><n id="2" /> for<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1799">in the presence of</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="3144" class="">witnesses</st>.

I <st data-num="3853" class="">charge</st> you<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1799">before</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> who <st data-num="2225">gives life</st> to <st data-num="3956">all things</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> who <st data-num="3140" class="">made</st> his <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="3671" class="">confession</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">before</st> <st data-num="4194" class="">Pontius</st> <st data-num="4091" class="">Pilate</st>,

to <st data-num="5083" class="">obey</st><n id="1" /> this <st data-num="1785" class="">command</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="784" class="">without fault</st> or <st data-num="423" class="">failure</st> <st data-num="3360" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="2015" class="">appearing</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>

—<st data-num="3739">whose appearing</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3107" class="">blessed</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3441" class="">only</st> <st data-num="1413" class="">Sovereign</st>, the <st data-num="935">King</st> of <st data-num="936">kings</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2962">Lord</st> of <st data-num="2961">lords</st>, will <st data-num="1166" class="">reveal</st> at the <st data-num="2398">right</st> <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st>.
He alone possesses immortality and lives in unapproachable light, whom no human has ever seen or is able to see. To him be honor and eternal power! Amen.
Command those who are rich in this world’s goods not to be haughty or to set their hope on riches, which are uncertain, but on God who richly provides us with all things for our enjoyment.

Tell them to <st data-num="14">do good</st>,<n id="1" /> to <st data-num="4147">be rich</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st>, to <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2130">generous givers</st>, <st data-num="2843">sharing with others</st>.<n id="2" />
In this way they will save up a treasure for themselves as a firm foundation for the future and so lay hold of what is truly life.
O Timothy, protect what has been entrusted to you. Avoid the profane chatter and absurdities of so-called “knowledge.”
By professing it, some have strayed from the faith. Grace be with you all.
